com.discretix.drmdlc.api
Interface IDxChallenge

public interface IDxChallenge

The object of this interface will be returned from generateChallengeFromInitiator or from generateChallengefromContent functions.

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getChallenge()
          Retrieves the generated challenge ready to be sent to the server.
 byte[] getPersonalizationChallenge()
          Retrieves the generated personalization challenge ready to be sent to the personalization server.
 java.lang.String getServerUrl()
          Retrieves a URL to the server, which the generated challenge should be sent to.
 java.lang.String getSoapAction()
          Retrieves an action type to be set in the HTTP header SOAPAction of the requset, which will contain the generated challenge
 IDxChallenge processServerResponse(byte[] serverResponse)
          Processes the response that the server sends in answer to the challenge.
 IDxChallenge processServerResponse(java.lang.String serverResponse)
          Processes the response that the server sends in answer to the challenge.
 

Method Detail

getChallenge

java.lang.String getChallenge()
                              throws DrmBadChallengeTypeException
Retrieves the generated challenge ready to be sent to the server.

Returns:
the challenge
Throws:
DrmBadChallengeTypeException - When used with personalization challenge.

getPersonalizationChallenge

byte[] getPersonalizationChallenge()
                                   throws DrmBadChallengeTypeException
Retrieves the generated personalization challenge ready to be sent to the personalization server.

Returns:
the challenge
Throws:
DrmBadChallengeTypeException - When used with non personalization challenges.

getServerUrl

java.lang.String getServerUrl()
Retrieves a URL to the server, which the generated challenge should be sent to.

Returns:
the URL

getSoapAction

java.lang.String getSoapAction()
Retrieves an action type to be set in the HTTP header SOAPAction of the requset, which will contain the generated challenge

Returns:
The action type

processServerResponse

IDxChallenge processServerResponse(java.lang.String serverResponse)
                                   throws DrmBadChallengeTypeException,
                                          java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Processes the response that the server sends in answer to the challenge.
If an acknowledgment challenge is required in response to a given challenge, this function generates such a challenge.

Parameters:
serverResponse - The server response.
Returns:
IDxChallenge that represents the generated acknowledgment challenge, if such a challenge has to be sent to the server, null - otherwise
Throws:
DrmBadChallengeTypeException - When you send a string with personalization challenge.
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When serverResponse is null.

processServerResponse

IDxChallenge processServerResponse(byte[] serverResponse)
                                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Processes the response that the server sends in answer to the challenge.
If an acknowledgment challenge is required in response to a given challenge, this function generates such a challenge.

Parameters:
serverResponse - The server response.
Returns:
IDxChallenge that represents the generated acknowledgment challenge, if such a challenge has to be sent to the server, null - otherwise
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - When serverResponse is null.
